short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search Croner-i tax, audit and accounting content whilst in Google.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
View your Croner-i Navigate content alongside your results from Google with the powerful NavigateMe Google integration tool.
 
NavigateMe will revolutionise the way our clients perform their tax and accounting research. We understand that some Croner-i Navigate users use Google as their first port of call for researching online. That’s why we have developed NavigateMe, a new powerful tool that enables users to view their search results from Croner-i Navigate alongside their Google search results. Your Croner-i Navigate search results are now just a click away, even when searching in Google, you’ll get your answers quicker than ever!
 
𝗛𝗼𝘄 𝗱𝗼𝗲𝘀 𝗡𝗮𝘃𝗶𝗴𝗮𝘁𝗲𝗠𝗲 𝘄𝗼𝗿𝗸?
 
There are three main features of NavigateMe:
 
𝗩𝗶𝗲𝘄 𝘆𝗼𝘂𝗿 𝗖𝗿𝗼𝗻𝗲𝗿-𝗶 𝗡𝗮𝘃𝗶𝗴𝗮𝘁𝗲 𝘀𝗲𝗮𝗿𝗰𝗵 𝗿𝗲𝘀𝘂𝗹𝘁𝘀 𝗮𝗹𝗼𝗻𝗴𝘀𝗶𝗱𝗲 𝗚𝗼𝗼𝗴𝗹𝗲 𝗿𝗲𝘀𝘂𝗹𝘁𝘀
Perform a search in Google and a box containing your search results from Croner-i Navigate will appear to the right of your Google results; click on these to directly access the results in Croner-i Navigate.
 
𝗦𝗲𝗮𝗿𝗰𝗵 𝗵𝗶𝗴𝗵𝗹𝗶𝗴𝗵𝘁𝗲𝗱 𝗸𝗲𝘆𝘄𝗼𝗿𝗱𝘀
Highlight any text on any webpage, then right-click and select NavigateMe, to instantly perform a search on Croner-i Navigate for the highlighted keywords.
 
𝗦𝘁𝗮𝗿𝘁 𝗮 𝘀𝗲𝗮𝗿𝗰𝗵 𝘄𝗶𝘁𝗵 𝗡𝗮𝘃𝗶𝗴𝗮𝘁𝗲𝗠𝗲
When in the Chrome browser, start your search with the term “NavigateMe” and the term you wish to search for. A search in Croner-i Navigate will be immediately performed for you in a new window.
 
Croner-i is dedicated to continuously advancing the Croner-i Navigate platform and NavigateMe to meet the evolving needs of professionals now, and as the industry changes.
 
A valid Croner-i Navigate subscription and credentials are required. If you’d like to find out more about Croner-i and how we can help your business, please telephone 0800 231 5199 or visit www.croneri.co.uk/demo.
